Change Log
==========

0.2.0 (2022/06/30)
-------------------
- First Release
- rename to ColorCraft


0.3.0 (2022/09/23)
-------------------
- new module Printv2
- print have new kw formats
- print only Accepts Color/str object
- activeColor() had been renamed to init()
- new ColorArray; delete and set items
- Blank class
